name: The Run: From Fire
description:
CONTROLS:
UpArrow - Jump
DownArrow - Duck/Slide
Spacebar - Change to day/night

John is in the middle of the forest, and he is not safe. A huge forest fire is out of control, and John has to run. Run for his life! Your task is to get him to safety. But like in every forest there are enemies. Enemies that are going to kill you. But what is dangerous at night might be harmless in the day, and what is dangerous at day might seek others at night. Switch between day and night, duck and jump over and under the obstacles and you will safely make it to the river.
